overview: Global seasoned executive with experience in tactical execution and strategic planning leading marketing, sales, business development and operations groups for start-up and fortune 1000 companies. Skilled at taking untraditional approaches to solve marketing, business development and operational challenges while identifying opportunities to accelerate growth. Motivational award winning managerial style adept at hiring, training and mentoring high performance account teams, manufacturing representatives and distributor networks. Industry experience includes internet services, sustainable products, enterprise software, research analytics and consumer goods.
